reviewText: This is a great video; however, it will not play on Blu Ray players.  It plays on older DVD players and computer DVD, but not blu ray.  When I bough it years ago, I though it had to do with my blu ray player, but since then, I've purchase several others and still no luck.  I even contacted Sony to let them know but no follow up.  Maybe the newer versions have fixed this issue.  I purchase my copy several years ago.

It is a international DVD,so it will not play on a standard DVD player.
Not all of the original film material was included on DVD.
